item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 22.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 15 File Size: 19.6 MB Posted By: pavel.petrushechkin Views: 29 Date Added: 2/11/2022 Release Noteshttps://docs.aspose.com/html/net/aspose-html-for-net-22-2-release-notes File Details Redesigned Text Processing Algorithms Some of the enhancements in the text processing include the application of font features, and improved rendering quality for some languages. item.title: Test Web Content Accessibility (WCAG 2) via .NET C# HTML API
item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.9 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.56MB Date Added: 5/9/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/html/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-html-for-net-23-9-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.9 release. File Details WCAG 2 Testing Support The new Aspose.Html.Accessibility namespace provides a comprehensive API for testing WCAG 2 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) requirements. Accurate NOSCRIPT Tag Treatment Aspose.HTML now more accurately interprets the NOSCRIPT HTML tag, which can be used to provide alternative content for users who do not have JavaScript enabled.

item.title: HTML Processing with Reduced Memory Usage | C# .NET Apps API
item.description: Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 4.8MB Date Added: 6/10/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/html/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-html-for-net-23-10-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 release. File Details Notable Performance Enhancements Aspose.HTML for .NET 23.10 release of the HTML API, offers faster and more efficient functionality, thanks to the following improvements: Better attribute storage and utilization Increaseed HTML parsing speed Optimized data structures Reduced memory usage Fewer redundant object creations Accessibility Improvements The AccessibilityRules class has been updated with a new GetRule(string ruleName) method to make it easier to retrieve specific accessibility rules.
